T02D3145:169b-1: badzra dha ra sam g'i ti stu ti /
T02D3145:169b-3: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa /
T02D3145:169b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3145:169b-5: mtshungs med stobs ldan mnyam nyid snying por gyur pa'i chos mnga' ba //
T02D3145:169b-6: thugs rje'i bdag can 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D3145:169b-7: yon tan ma lus kun ldan dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad cing //
T02D3145:169b-8: dri med stobs ldan mnyam med mchog gi chos rab dang ldan pa //
T02D3145:169b-9: nam mkha' mnyam pa dag gi yon tan rdul phran zer mi yod //
T02D3145:169b-10: dpe ni mtshams kyi pha rol 'ga' zhig na yang dmigs pa min //
T02D3145:169b-11: dpe las rnam par 'das pa'i dngos grub ma lus dam pa rnams //
T02D3145:169b-12: mtha' yas sems can khams la mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad //
T02D3145:169b-13: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs kyis bzhengs pa'i smon lam can //
T02D3145:169b-14: dngos grub ji srid 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa //
T02D3145:169b-15: ma lus mchog tu sgrub par mdzad pa skye dgu rnams kyi don //
T02D3145:169b-16: rtag tu rnam par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnams //
T02D3145:169b-17: 'gag pa med pa nyid du thugs rjes kun nas spyod ldan la //
T02D3145:169b-18: mi g-yo rab gsal 'jig rten gsum na dngos grub mchog rnams gnang //
T02D3145:169b-19: dpag med gzhal du med la legs pa nyid du snyoms zhugs pa'i //
T02D3145:169b-20: rtogs shing mkhyen pa'i chos nyid shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung //
T02D3145:169b-21: dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub mchog gi mchog sbyin
T02D3145:169b-22: mdzad pas bdag / mchog stsol stsal na rtag tu
T02D3145:169b-23: mchog gi rtogs pa'i rtogs dang ldan //
T02D3145:169b-24: 'jig rten gsum na mchog sbyin mchog rnams mtha' dag grub pa po //
T02D3145:169b-25: dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po sgrib pa kun nas mi mnga' ba'o//
T02D3145:170a-0: @170a * // dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i rtog pa nas gsungs pa //
T02D3145:170a-1: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa'o //
